1.title: Masculin Féminin
1.plot: After dragging an unconscious Yogi back to the Sweaty Bender Room, Ali is suddenly confronted by the impending return of his dream girl, Chelsea.

2.title: Fucked
2.plot: Ali learns that Chelsea got "fucked" while in India and Stacey debates how best to apologize to Chelsea after previously vomiting on her and punching her in the face.

3.title: Damned If I Do, Bored If I Don't
3.plot: Ali decides to make a move with Chelsea. But can he build up the courage before she slips into a K-hole?

4.title: Benders, Blowjobs and Bobsleds
4.plot: Ali finally reaches a new level of connection with Chelsea until the harmony of the group is thrown into disarray when Ali's dad enters.

5.title: The Jenga Lord and the Misogynist
5.plot: Ali makes a move on Chelsea; Jake pushes Stacey to breaking point; and Yogi believes the government is coming for him.

6.title: Illusions
6.plot: Jake confronts Chelsea about her intentions with Ali; Chelsea confronts Jake about his feelings for Stacey; and Yogi challenges Ali to define his relationship with Chelsea.

7.title: Sputnik Sweetheart
7.plot: With summer drawing to a close, Chelsea announces she is leaving, breaking Ali's heart and leaving Jake to pick up the pieces.

imdb.plot outline: Over the course of a summer, we follow the idealistic space cadet Ali in pursuit of his dream girl: the gorgeous, spiritual and insightful Chelsea. While most people fall in love, Ali belly-flops into it. For him, friendship is eternal, music is emotion, drugs are life-enhancers, and love is pure and poetic. However, he is about to find out how finite and fickle these conceptions are. Between his cynical best friend Jake, the off-his-lips party-animal Yogi and the contradictory hipster Stacey, Ali tries to make sense of life, believing the answer is Chelsea. But, like the high they are all so wrapped up in, these naïve preconceptions will eventually come crashing down...
imdb.title: Blind
plot: "_Blind_ (qv)" is a youth-based comedy-drama web series where the forces of love, music, drugs, friendship and spirituality collide in the heightened environment of the Sweaty Bender Room, a place where the party never stops.

Over the course of a summer, we follow the idealistic space cadet Ali in pursuit of his dream girl: the gorgeous, spiritual and insightful Chelsea. While most people fall in love, Ali belly-flops into it. For him, friendship is eternal, music is emotion, drugs are life-enhancers, and love is pure and poetic. However, he is about to find out how finite and fickle these conceptions are. Between his cynical best friend Jake, the off-his-lips party-animal Yogi and the contradictory hipster Stacey, Ali tries to make sense of life, believing the answer is Chelsea. But, like the high they are all so wrapped up in, these naïve preconceptions will eventually come crashing down...
